DOC.brief_summary: Determine safety 2MD , vitamin D analog , administer orally daily 28 day healthy normal postmenopausal woman .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Study Oral Vitamin D Analog Postmenopausal Women
DOC.criteria: 1 . Normal healthy postmenopausal woman , ≥ 60 ≤ 80 year age , 45 60 year age amenorrheic least 2 year plus serum FSH level > 30 IU/L , woman document bilateral oophorectomy least 2 year prior study start . 2 . Within ±30 % ideal body weight height body frame . 3 . Demonstrated ability understand willingness sign Informed Consent Form . 4 . 24hour urinary Ca ≤250 mg/day urinary Ca : Cr ≤0.35 . 5 . Negative urine test select drug abuse . 6 . Willing maintain total calcium intake 700 1000 mg/day . 1 . Any acute chronic condition would limit subject 's ability complete study . 2 . Active clinical manifestation significant metabolic , hematological , pulmonary , hepatic , cardiovascular , gastrointestinal ( include malabsorption ) , neurological , renal , urological psychiatric disorder . 3 . History presence disease know believe influence calcium absorption metabolism . 4 . History renal calculus . 5 . History eat disorder . 6 . History stomach intestinal surgery . 7 . History hypersensitivity allergy vitamin D derivative . 8 . History presence abnormal ECG . 9 . Use medication product affect vitamin D metabolism within 6 month prior study entry . 10 . Use medication product affect calcium balance bone turnover within 6 month prior study entry . 11 . Participation investigational study drug trial receipt investigational study drug occur within 60 day prior study entry . 12 . Use vitamin and/or mineral supplement > 1X RDI within 4 week prior study entry , unless deem acceptable Investigator . 13 . Poor peripheral venous access . 14 . Receipt blood product within 2 month prior study entry .
